snippet: Senior government officials were not injured in the hotel explosion, but a security official in Aden said at least 18 people were killed in the soldiers’ building.
abstract: Islamic State takes responsibility for number of bombings in Yemen's two biggest cities that killed at least 25 people; military headquarters in Arden is among targets.

byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Saeed Al-Batati reported from Al Mukalla, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Senior government officials were not injured in the hotel explosion, but a security official in Aden said at least 18 people were killed in the soldiers’ building.

headline.main: ISIS Takes Responsibility for Bombings in Yemen
headline.print_headline: ISIS Takes Responsibility for Bombings in Yemen

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
